message: Hunting is conservation. All the meat is eaten (by locals mostly) and the money goes directly to the people doing the actual protection/conservation work. People who think that donations and photo safaris are going to fix the problem are Saving these animals to death.

We/USA are the laughing stock of the world. With our guns are more important than people lives!!!! Does not matter what the age or where the massacre. Guns and the push of the NRA rally every time. Other civilized countries can and do have better laws on gun control. I'm not a paranoid person who sees shadows and someone coming for them at every turn. What I do see are children gunned down, normal every day people at movies gun down, Universities students gun down, Marines gun down, people in a church gun down. This is real life for us now.
